member.name: T:Opus.Core.Executors.IExtractionExecutor
member.summary:
Service for extracting bookmarks from files.
Has methods for saving into one or more pdfs or as a zip-file.
Default implementation is included in the same namespace.

member.name: M:Opus.Core.Executors.IExtractionExecutor.Save(System.IO.FileSystemInfo,System.Collections.Generic.IList{Opus.Services.Implementation.Data.Extraction.FileAndBookmarkWrapper})
member.summary: Save selected bookmarks into one or more files.
member.param: Destination as a file or folder path (depending on whether bookmarks are saved in a single or multiple files).

member.name: T:Opus.Core.Wrappers.BookmarkStorage
member.summary: Storage class for displaying and selecting bookmarks

member.name: P:Opus.Core.Wrappers.BookmarkStorage.Range
member.summary: Pages between start page and end page as a string
